name: Jean Grey
aliases: Marvel Girl , Red,  Phoenix , Dark Phoenix, White Phoenix of the Crown, Redd Dayspring
powersText: Telekinesis  Telepathy  Astral projection   Eidetic memory  Mind reading and control  Memory alteration and erasure  Psionic blasts   Phoenix Force :  Matter and energy manipulation  Time manipulation  Space travel  "Cosmic fire"  Disintegration energy  Resurrection from death and manipulation of life energy in others
